verses.text: For \w Zion’s|strong="H6726"\w* sake will I not hold my \w peace|strong="H2814"\w*, and for \w Jerusalem’s|strong="H3389"\w* sake I will not \w rest|strong="H8252"\w*, until the \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w* thereof go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* as \w brightness|strong="H5051"\w*, and the \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w* thereof as a \w lamp|strong="H3940"\w* \add that\add* \w burneth|strong="H1197"\w*.

And the \w Gentiles|strong="H1471"\w* shall \w see|strong="H7200"\w* thy \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w*, and all \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* thy \w glory|strong="H3519"\w*: and thou shalt be \w called|strong="H7121"\w* by a \w new|strong="H2319"\w* \w name|strong="H5344"\w*, which the \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.

Thou shalt also be a \w crown|strong="H5850"\w* of \w glory|strong="H8597"\w* in the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and a \w royal|strong="H4410"\w* \w diadem|strong="H6797"\w* in the \w hand|strong="H3709"\w* of thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

Thou shalt no more be \w termed|strong="H0559"\w* \w Forsaken|strong="H5800"\w*; neither shall thy \w land|strong="H0776"\w* any more be \w termed|strong="H0559"\w* \w Desolate|strong="H8077"\w*: but thou shalt be \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w Hephzi-bah|strong="H2657"\w*, and thy \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w Beulah|strong="H1166"\w*: for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w delighteth|strong="H2654"\w* in thee, and thy \w land|strong="H0776"\w* shall be \w married|strong="H1166"\w*.\f + \fr 62.4 \ft Hephzi-bah: that is, My delight is in her\f*\f + \fr 62.4 \ft Beulah: that is, Married\f*

¶ For \add as\add* a young \w man|strong="H0970"\w* \w marrieth|strong="H1166"\w* a \w virgin|strong="H1330"\w*, \add so\add* shall thy \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w marry|strong="H1166"\w* thee: and \add as\add* the \w bridegroom|strong="H2860"\w* \w rejoiceth|strong="H4885"\w* over the \w bride|strong="H3618"\w*, \add so\add* shall thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w rejoice|strong="H7797"\w* over thee.\f + \fr 62.5 \ft as the…: Heb. with the joy of the bridegroom\f*

I have \w set|strong="H6485"\w* \w watchmen|strong="H8104"\w* upon thy \w walls|strong="H2346"\w*, O \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \add which\add* shall \w never|strong="H8548"\w* hold their \w peace|strong="H2814"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* nor \w night|strong="H3915"\w*: ye that make \w mention|strong="H2142"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, keep not \w silence|strong="H1824"\w*,\f + \fr 62.6 \ft make…: or, are the \+nd LORD’s\+nd* remembrancers\f*

And \w give|strong="H5414"\w* him no \w rest|strong="H1824"\w*, till he \w establish|strong="H3559"\w*, and till he \w make|strong="H7760"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* a \w praise|strong="H8416"\w* in the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.\f + \fr 62.7 \ft rest: Heb. silence\f*

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w sworn|strong="H7650"\w* by his right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w*, and by the \w arm|strong="H2220"\w* of his \w strength|strong="H5797"\w*, Surely I \w will|strong="H0518"\w* no more \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thy \w corn|strong="H1715"\w* \add to be\add* \w meat|strong="H3978"\w* for thine \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*; and the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w stranger|strong="H5236"\w* shall not \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* thy \w wine|strong="H8492"\w*, for the which thou hast \w laboured|strong="H3021"\w*:\f + \fr 62.8 \ft Surely…: Heb. If I give, etc\f*

But they that have \w gathered|strong="H0622"\w* it shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* it, and \w praise|strong="H1984"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; and they that have brought it \w together|strong="H6908"\w* shall \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* it in the \w courts|strong="H2691"\w* of my \w holiness|strong="H6944"\w*.

¶ Go \w through|strong="H5674"\w*, go \w through|strong="H5674"\w* the \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*; \w prepare|strong="H6437"\w* ye the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*; cast \w up|strong="H5549"\w*, cast \w up|strong="H5549"\w* the \w highway|strong="H4546"\w*; gather \w out|strong="H5619"\w* the \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*; lift \w up|strong="H7311"\w* a \w standard|strong="H5251"\w* for the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

Behold, the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w proclaimed|strong="H8085"\w* unto the \w end|strong="H7097"\w* of the \w world|strong="H0776"\w*, \w Say|strong="H0559"\w* ye to the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, Behold, thy \w salvation|strong="H3468"\w* \w cometh|strong="H0935"\w*; behold, his \w reward|strong="H7939"\w* \add is\add* with him, and his \w work|strong="H6468"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him.\f + \fr 62.11 \ft work: or, recompence\f*

And they shall \w call|strong="H7121"\w* them, The \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, The \w redeemed|strong="H1350"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: and thou shalt be \w called|strong="H7121"\w*, Sought \w out|strong="H1875"\w*, A \w city|strong="H5892"\w* not \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w*.
